case.state: Calm down girl! I just got to the table and you instantly go on a rant about Puyos being a videogame or something?!
Prepare for a not-so-sweet side of me today...
Hmm... I seem to have been transported to yet another new world in the middle of a Puyo battle, but if this works like every other world I've been at, all I need is to play this game to fix it!
Hey you, stranger! I seem to have been transported to yet another new world, so I'll need your help to play this game so that I can hopefully get transported back home.
Whoa! This masked girl gives me the creeps.
Wait a second, this pink haired girl looks familiar, could it be...?
That blue twintailed girl over there... Have I seen her before?
Is that a ghost, get it away! Get it away!
W... Wait is that a... a G-GHOST?!!!!
Whoa! That has to be the most amount of hair I've seen on a human before.
These are more spooky creatures than I can deal with... I'll play the game, but as soon as I'm done I'm getting out of here!
Hey! Careful with that demon looking, parasol... thingy!
Why would you even bring that huge parasol here?!
(Great, if I didn't struggle with names enough, these two have the same one?)
With that outfit, that energy and asking for a song? You must be an Idol of some sort, right?
Hold up. Orgy? I did not hear about that when I entered the game, that's not actually part of the rules right? Right?!
W... wait, a talking butterfly? I guess it's not that weird considering what I've seen but, doesn't that mean it will be out as soon as it loses one hand?
Of course! You are Amy, right? You look a little less... furry than the last time I saw you!
Aww... aren't you just the cutest thing with those fox ears and fluffy tail!
A ghost! A horny ghost! Not just a holy ghost, but a horny ghost! A ghost that's wholly got holes!
A... Arle?! W... What are you doing here?! I thought I was alone. Are you playing too? Does this mean at least one of us is going to see the other do... that?!
I see we are playing under sun puyo rules, Let's do this!
I see we are playing under sun puyo rules, Let's do this!
W... wait, are we starting?! Are you all really ok with having that unscientific thing playing with us?!
Am I really the only girl here? This feels like it's going to get real sketchy, real soon...
Hey, if it's only girls here, that takes a lot of pressure off everyone, so let's all have fun!
Well, it's going to be nice to solve a problem without having to play Puyo or Tetris for once...
This may neither be Puyo Puyo, nor Tetris, but I'm a fast learner!
Right! Let's poker battle!
Swap!
I'll place these cards on the hold space for now.
If you try to send me garbage cards, I'll send 'em right back at ya, dealer!
My calculations tell me that swapping these cards will give me an ideal probability.
Hmm... yes.. I'll take these ones and return these ones.
How about this?
Let's experiment!
Try one of these!
Certainly...
You mean I can hold more than one piece at a time?! This is great!
Time to swap!
I pick this one and this one...
Yeah... this should work...
This one can go, but this one will be good.
C'mon, I really need this...
Please work...
Uh... second chance here we go...
One more shot, please be better!
Risking in the past hasn't worked, let's play it safe.
If this works...
Every round I get a good hand is a round I have to stay around them...
Yeah sure, I bet if I actually wanted to stay I would be getting bad hands...
It seems I am bad at throwing...
Why am I playing good when I want to get out of here as fast as I can...
This... hand is too good...
No no! I wanted to lose this hand, not win it!
Gah! I got a good hand. Why?!
This hand won't get me out of here any faster...
Well, as I said, I'm terrible at flirting... But since my hand is good, I may as well give it a shot at some point...
I can't get a bad hand when I try...
Great...
But I didn't want a good hand now...
Guess I'll have to wait another round then...
Everyone has amazing hands right? Enough to beat me... Right?
Being new to the game means I can't throw correctly either it seems...
Well, this should at least break my bad streak for now.
Hope you enjoyed my quick streak of bad luck, 'cause here's where I make my comeback!
I knew this couldn't last for much longer, try to beat this!
Oh yeah! I'm breaking your chain early with this hand!
Tee hee.
Never expected my expertise on maths and calculations to help me in a situation like this!
I won't deny beginner's luck can always be a factor, and one I'll gladly take!

Statistics tell me I should be safe with this hand.
I'm pumped!
I'll solve them all!
Perfect!
Correct!
Lucky♪

Well, well...

♪ I know I'm safe because this hand is GREAT! G-R-E-A-T! ♪

Well, as i said I'm terrible at flirting... But what the heck, I may give it a shot at some point.

I hope everyone's hands are better than this one...

Average, but statistics show that average still gives me a decent chance of survival...
This is by no means the first time I've been transported to a new world, this seems to be the one with the most perverted game though...
You know, I always wonder why our adventures always seem to start with someone being teleported to a new strange place...
It seems that no matter what world I end up at, there's always a game to be played, it's fascinating really.

This is fun.

Looking good!

Don't think that just because I'm new to this type of battle, I'll be easy pickings.

As long as this combo is decent enough, I should be safe.
The fact that I have no clue if this is enough is kind of exciting, you know?

I know this may not be the best combo, but it should get me through this hand.
A challenge to win, maybe? Maybe not!
While not amazing, the odds are still in my favor this time around.
I'm always up to a challenge!
Come on, don't fail me now!

Nothing else to do, good luck everyone!

Ready?
May the biggest chain... Or hand in this case, win!
Hah! I got a bad hand, which means I'll be out of here in no time! Take that, strange creatures!
This hand sucks!
I've successfully ruined this round for myself!
The chances that I don't lose this round are minimal.

I'm losing this round and there's no ghostly way that you creatures interfere now!
Yes! Give me all the bad cards so I can get away from them!
Well, as i said I'm terrible at flirting... Almost as terrible as the hand I have...

Yes... this is exactly what I wanted...
It's so close now...
Just as I hoped...
This has to be bad enough to work...

How many times in a row can I get bad hands...
Well, looks like we can add one more round to my bad streak...

Oh dear...

Seriously, what are the chances of this?!
Ow ow ow ow!

Danger, danger!
Nononono! Miss-drop! Miss-drop!

I made a mistake...
How can I possibly resolve this predicament...
It was at this moment that I, Ringo Ando, realized that I was doomed...
What the f-actor?!

Son of a digit!

I messed up...
Aaaand... That's one round down the drain for sure...

This is as frustrating as having a nuisance puyo land on your trigger space just before you start your chain. Anyone else know what I mean? No? I guess I should have expected that...
No! No! No!
Why?! Haven't I lost enough?!
Well, I may as well prepare myself early...
Disaster incoming...
I regret everything!
Alright, since you seem to not be an unscientific creature, I hope you don't mind me focusing on you., ~player~... It's going to be the only way I don't end up leaving halfway through...
Now with the bravery that ~player~ has infused me with, I'll beat you all, scientific or not!
Boy have I... The question would be which one would you like to know from? Maybe the first one, where I had to learn to break Puyos to stop an ethereal creature from destroying the universe?

Well, I don't think there's much to say about the place I come from. From what I've seen, my world is pretty similar to this one. I guess it does have fewer Puyo battles and more perverted games, though.
It sounds so... cold and soulless when you say it like that...
And let me guess, your cute little company is some key part of your heroine antics, right?
W... wait, how is that tail attached to her anyways?!
Really? I mean controlling plants with magic is kinda cool, but to use that to straight up cheat here? How did you even make it grow out on this rooftop anyways?
Really? I mean controlling plants with magic is kinda cool, but to use that to straight up cheat here? How did you even make it grow out from out of the concrete anyways?
Hold up. You mean boats outside of the game pass by here?! It's enough to be like this with you people already!
Jeez, really tall black haired girl. Talk about thinking negatively! But hey, considering what I've seen and experienced, I don't think a game like this one poses a real threat to any of us.
Jeez, I can't imagine how it must had been to deal with death and crime from such a young age. Then again, that's probably the very reason as to why you were chosen as the "ultimate".
Oh boy... She doesn't know? This is going to get even more awkward for her if she ends up losing again...
Personally I thought it was a scandalous act whether you are famous or not...
Shy when it comes to talking but bold when it comes to taking off her clothes? — What a combo!
I guess I've just gotten used to people with wings on my adventures... Draco, Satan, Harpy...
Is she just saying out loud that she is cheating, or that she has a pair?

Phew, that's a relief then... You know, one of my friends told me she ended up decapitating a common acquaintance of ours once. But I guess he is also immortal because the guy still joins us in our adventures most of the times.
Interesting, I've dealt with a robot with a really good AI back at the S.S. Tetra, but you seem to be programmed to act like your designer, are you like a virtual clone of her?
Well... nice aim I guess, even if it was an accident...
Yeah you say that... but I'm pretty sure that's a fact you had already let slip by a couple of times already...

Well, there's this one Dark Prince I know who I heard talking to Arle, saying how she should be grateful that he reset the universe so that she could have a happier life or something like that, but honestly, he's had even lamer ways to try to get her to date him...
Exploring ruins is almost certainly a guarantee for adventure, plus if this game doesn't return me home, ruins tend to be a good place to start looking for answers, so I'm in.

Heh, usually I'm not much for gossip, but I guess since this is a different world's gossip it won't matter. Apparently our version of Satan used to be married to a super powerful magician called Lilith, Satan outlived her, and now pursues my friend Arle, who apparently looks very similar to her.

state.text: *Continous garbling of confusion and shock...*

case.state: Well, I did bring this one little book to help me summon spells, but... I don't know if you'd be able to use it for anything so...

Thanks for the offer, Meia. But I've already had enough space adventures at the S.S. Tetra. At any rate, part of the deal with Marle and Squares to keep our memories about it was to not go up there again...
Well, everyone would hope to never have to lie, sadly, we all know white lies are sometimes required, Jessie...
Family is always first, not even a doubt about it.

Well, even a million dollars can go on a blink if not spent carefully. I'd probably have to take a bit to think of the best way to invest it in something that will eventually return me even more profits... uhhh.. can I take a bit more to think about it?

Well, considering that both Satan and Ecolo seem to follow Arle, Amitie and me on all our adventures somehow, you kinda have to get used to just ignoring the fact that they're probably the very reason we are in trouble in the first place...
Well, my friends aren't exactly the mall shopping type, but considering that my family's store is at Suzuran's shopping district, it's not like it's a strange place for me, Amy.

Heh, I guess it makes sense, the sphere shaped robot scared of creatures that kick spheres. I have tried it a couple of times with Maguro but I'm really that good at it, sadly... or gladly in this case?

state.text: It feels like a lot of Idol groups need to have a gimmick nowadays. I guess if your group didn't do it, someone else would have beaten you to the punch with it. My zombified redhead idol girl.

case.state: Whoa! For a second I doubted my eyes, but you do have multiple arms!
Sure, Noir! You seem to have plenty experience, so I can't imagine of a better teacher right now.
Sure, Adrien! You seem to have plenty experience, so I can't imagine of a better teacher right now.
I... well, it's okay to keep some things a secret. If it means you get to have more fun, right...?
Well, if you don't want to drink blood, and please do not drink mine thank you. You could always go the fruit bat way, with something like an apple! Again... I don't mean me.
GAH! That's it, from now on I'm staying away from you!
Well when you put it that way it does sound a bit cruel! But I'm glad you'll at least stop now...
Ignore her Ringo, you just have to make sure you lose and you'll be away from her and her bad puns in a heartbeat...
Oh, your little friend wants an apple? I'm sure I have a couple more I can spare.
Well, not me, Arle does. My magic is pretty limited to just electricity attacks so... I guess my equivalent would be to shock someone to death if I'm not careful?

state.text: Oh, sorry, is "robot" like a derogatory term for your kind?! If so I'm so sorry! I'll try extra hard to remember your name properly.

case.state: Oh no you misunderstand, Meia. It wasn't a threat. The thing is the Tetra crew is so deep in space that it could even be considered a different dimension, and when people of different dimensions interact, well, it's a really long and complicated story...
Nice! I may not be much into computers, but at least it will be nice to not be the only number geek in the room for a change...
So, what was the deal with your companion? Skimpy school uniform girl?
I mean, you are topless already. {small}And you also have a really nice, fit body too so I don't blame ~player~...
I mean, you are playing topless. {small}And you also have a really nice, fit body too so I don't blame ~player~...
Really? I mean controlling plants with magic is kinda cool, but to use that to straight up cheat here?
Ooh! Teleport would be nice, specially one so I can get back to my world easier in case situations like this repeat in the future!
Ghosts need lawyers, how does that even work?

state.text: An arrow icon? What are you even talking about, girl?
An arrow icon? What are you even talking about, girl?
Again with the arrow icon thing? Is this like a weird thing between you two, a weird language thing in this world or something else?
Again with the arrow icon thing? Is this like a weird thing between you two, a weird language thing in this world or something else?

case.state: Well, I wish I could have an answer to that, but back at Suzuran High's Physics club we only ended up being me, Maguro and Risukuma, and he was there only cause he blew up the chemistry club...
Well, I'm, currently having Maguro teach me a bit, he is an excellent cook!
Heh! I knew I wasn't the only one that did that! Arash.
That sounds extremely dangerous is more than one way, Aella...
Well, I haven't had the chance yet but I'd probably would like to see my partner when it happens...
Well, I haven't had the chance yet but... N... no! I refuse to answer such a personal thing yet.
I'd most definitely be heartbroken. There are just some things that you can't do and expect a relation to survive.
I don't even have a partner right now, and rarely have time for myself like that... that said though, I could probably open a space for me to do it at least a couple times a week....
I don't even have a partner right now... Wait, why do I even have to answer this in front of strangers?!

Well, I can probably count with my fingers the times I've actually seen a video of that kind. I don't dislike them or anything, but between my studies, adventures and the family grocery store I barely have time for stuff like that.
I'm too busy to do that kind of stuff. Can we move along, now?
A question I sadly won't be able to answer until I experience it for the first time...
Don't you feel your questions are becoming a bit too personal for people you've just met?!
I haven't had the chance to be on any of them yet... {small}B... But the thought of getting pinned down in a m... mating press is kinda exciting...{!reset}
I haven't had the chance to be on any of them yet... And that's already sharing way too much info for me...
Nope, nope, nope, nope!
Heh, if you think that hat looks strange, I know a certain someone that uses some sort of weird boot/pant thing, now that is something.
Aww, I remember Cream last time I was in your world, so small and cute, wait, is she really old enough to play cards now?

condition.saying: changing from a Dungeon of Death

case.state: Have you ever considered changing your trials to Puyo matches? You still get to see people beat each other up with magic, but the loser just gets knocked out at best instead of dying, and they still get to do some banter before and after the match in most cases.
Stop talking about it... Y... you're just putting weird ideas into my mind now...
Like, all of them all of them? Someone out there could have like little robot-human kids out there?
What even could be so bad that they wouldn't allow into this place? Was your other body full of weapons for self defense and it was too dangerous... or... Oooohh.... {small}oh...
Yeah, you say that, but I'm pretty sure for anyone outside of this place, all they saw was your ancestor entering a perverted game...
Well, it may not be on this world, but Suzuran is a small-ish common city. We have a port, malls, schools, pretty normal stuff. Which is why adventures like this are always so exciting!
Last time someone went around asking what everyone's wishes were in my world, we almost ended up in a disaster, so excuse me if I refrain from answering.
Well I guess there's Ecolo or Satan, but I wouldn't really call them "enemies"... more like very persistent nuisances...
Don't even try it, I know how you ghosts work, first you break logic by existing and being nice, and then you come up with crazy schemes to make everyone else ghosts too!
Y... you mean like, coming here and undressing me yourself? I ah... {small}Would really like it...{!reset}
Wouldn't it be more fun if you won a fair game against ~player~ though? Winning is a good bonus, but the point is to have fun!
Well, he gets called "creeper" and "pervert" a lot, to the point where Arle seems to be able to summon him just by shouting one of those two things into the air.
Oh thank the puyos, the aura and the noise went away... I thought I wouldn't be able to hear anyone else for the rest of the game...
And now another girl showed up out of nowhere!
Yeah, I know of a guy that tries to give sweets away to calm people down sometimes, the way he goes about it though only makes him look extremely suspicious...
I don't think I've ever heard of a maid that got asked to be a warrior too...
Well, if we were talking about a Puyo match, a star would probably mean that either one of the players needs to set off a big chain or they already lost.
Yeah... I'd rather not have to be permanently looking at one of my opponent's crotches just to know if he is bluffing or not...
Well, I didn't bring any with me, but if you somehow manage to end up at Suzaran town, come over to the Ando greengrocer store, and we'll get you some of the best homemade fruit pies instead!
If I had a penny for each time I've heard of a fish man that tries to be a ladies man, I'd have two pennies, which isn't a lot, but it's strange it has happened twice...
Wouldn't that defeat the purpose of not losing the hand in the first place, red-eyed wizard girl?

I have not had the chance to go through many dungeons myself. My friend Arle however says she had to go through a bunch of them when she was younger and before the whole Puyo thing started. She actually met a lot of her friends there!
By the way, I didn't mean anything bad when I mentioned your bodysuit. In fact, it really shows off your um... body... shape... quite well...
Looking at your attitude all game, I'm a bit scared to even ask what high-tension strip poker even is...
Jenga I could maybe see working... But how would strip baseball even work?!

I wouldn't worry about it, one of my best friends is also a ginger and she has plenty of soul and energy all the time! (At least I think she is ginger, sometimes the lighting makes her hair look brown instead...)
I mean, it's not like there's a professional strip poker league out there... Right, redhead idol girl?
Well you can be sure I'm not one of them, I prefer my days as shiny and clear as they can get.
Wow, I'm sorry about that. But hey, it seems you've been able to adapt to your situation, right?
And what is a "Pokémon" anyways? Twintail bun girl?
Yeah. Ever since my Puyo adventures started, I've become really close to my friends Amitie and Arle. I may not be able to be with them all the time, but whenever I am, it's always a great time!
That does bring some... Weird images to my mind... Whatever was going on with whoever tried it first?
Aren't hippies just that one fad from many decades ago now? I don't think anyone dresses like that anymore nowdays.
What even are those things in your box? Something like gems?
I do not like those eyes gambling-girl has right now. Am I the only one seeing them glow red?
I guess taking a photo while we are still mostly normal is a good idea.
Walking around and exploring new places is usually the best part of an adventure. That said I still feel I'm more of a city girl at my core.
Unscientific stuff, like YOU!!!
Hey, whatever helps calm your nerves!
Honestly Jim, I'm asking myself that very same question right now...

Thankfully, none of my adventures have had the need to be that violent yet. Not that I couldn't, from what Arle told me, our spells have the power to decapitate someone if we are not careful with them.
W... wait a minute?! G...G...Ghosts?! Keep them away from me! Keep them away from me!
Heh, I knew I felt something between you two the last time. Sorry to hear it hasn't worked out for you, Amy.
I've run delivery for my family's business a couple of times in the past. So I know how you feel after a bad tip...
(I really grabbed his penis... I am so glad he didn't seem to mind though...)
(Heh, even with the size, his thingy is kinda cute. isn't it? Flailing around every time he moves...)
Huh... Don't pay much attention to it, Megumin. Some girls just prefer to shave themselves... down there...
Well, if he is to be believed, a certain perverted black mage claims to be over 180 years old, even though he doesn't look much older than me...
Behind?! Wait, w... what?! GAH!!! Stop!
Nope, even though I can see a lot of similarities to my world I can say for sure that this isn't it.

Must have been quite an interesting early years if you could do it since you were born. I didn't get my electric powers until I was in Jr. High School, and I still depend on puyos to use em for the most part.
It's fine, I guess I'm a bit used to people having a gimmick around here, just don't expect to get extra cards for to choose from just because you have extra hands.
By the way, Nami, about what you said earlier, I don't know what Devil Fruits are, but if you have a couple maybe we can see what we can do with them after the game.

Well me and my friends do end up in a lot of adventures but not the relic hunting type... I guess there was this one time we had to find stars on pedestals to fix towns problems, but that all ended up being just a scheme of Satan to try to get a date with Arle...
A competition? Well, I could go the easy route and say maths. But here's a more unique one, vision. Mine is 20/4, which means I can see the Andromeda Galaxy, even in daylight!

condition.saying: Does anyone else want some cake?

case.state: Heh, Pinkie, you just reminded me of a certain suspicious green mage right now...
That's actually a pretty good question, any actual people from this world can give me and Stella a bit of info on that?
A net? Why would you even need a net to get cabbages?
Not really, I do know a self-proclaimed all-seeing divinator... Not that it ever helps her win Puyo matches though...
Does the time Satan sent me and my friends to a book world to find star relic thingies count, Fate? Even if it was just another one of his schemes to spend time with Arle?
He healed from breaking his legs in one day? This "Entity" thing you talk about sounds like a really useful thing to have... Even if that was indeed very dumb...
Oh, they run a greengrocery store, only the best fruits and vegetables in the town!
Hmmm, I feel you aren't that comfortable using your real name? What should I call you then, your idol one, or the real one?
So, how did you end up with a nickname like that? "Princess of Death" sounds so much cooler than anything I'll probably be called during my life.

You pose a good question, Mari. What even is my type? I guess being childhood friends and getting used to someone with a literal perfect face makes you not care much about the physical looks side of things...
H... hold on, you mean that, people actually prefer our umm... type of... size out there?
When this game ends, if I'm still not back at my world, remind me to never go for a drink with the redhead fanged girl...
You really gotta be careful with those lab experiments, one of my friends ended up looking like a half bear, half squirrel creature after one of them blew on his face.
So you say you have experience traveling worlds, Noire? I hope you have found a way to avoid the temporal amnesia that sometimes comes from a faulty jump between them.
So... how did they feel...? my breasts... I've not really had anyone besides myself to feel them before...
So I'm wondering, this extra sense of yours... How far can it reach? Do you get like a sensory overload if you are like in a bunched up crowd?

H... hold up... Did you just say my butt was a "8/10"?! Y... yeah I guess it's not perfect but I'm glad you like it enough... And... maybe I can let you "rate" it closer after the game... if you want...
Keep acting so cute, and I just may take your offer. Prepare the get patted!
As a matter of fact, I have run into a harpy a couple of times in the past, not that dangerous, terrible singer however...
Heh, one of my friends is also just like that, energetic, always upbeat, and a bit of a bubble head, she's always a joy to have around.
Hmmm. I wonder, under that description. Would being able to do Puyo matches count as a quirk?
Well I don't know if being able to use a bit of electricity during Puyo matches count as a Quirk. What do you think?
I don't trust whatever weird thing is going on between ~human~ and super poem enthusiast girl... But at least it seems harmless for now. So I guess I can try to ignore it and keep playing.
A Dark Prince and an aethereal creature? Wait, does that mean that both Satan and Ecolo know what we are doing?!
No not weird really... I'm more thinking to what you said before... You know, about whatever happens tonight being our secret...?
Hey... now that I think about it, the people you talk of, the way you look, would you happen to know a blue hedgehog too?
Great... Now that I'm stuck on a different world, Maguro will surely take the extra time to make an impossible to beat valentine's day gift... again...

state.text: Happy new year everyone! It is new year's eve in this world too, right?

case.state: This is not how I expected to celebrate my birthday but... I'll just have to think I'm getting a very perverted birthday present, right? Oh, also happy Pi day too...
So... even though I do have to finish the game, I'm having a great time. J-just don't tell anyone, okay? I... might get lost here more often, if I have a choice next time...
Ahem...With that little confusion out of the way... Greetings! My name is Ringo! And I know we are going to have a most wonderful game. Muahahaha!
Ahem...With that little confusion out of the way... Greetings! My name is Ringo! If we are going to play this game, we may as well introduce ourselves.

At the very least this grass feels soft on my feet.
(His thingy is really just... hanging there... isn't it? Flailing around every time he moves...)

Alright if we are going through with this regardless... Greetings! My name is Ringo! If we are going to play this game, we may as well introduce ourselves, even the ghostly creature over there.
Man this really came down to the last hand huh? I can feel the tension rising right now...
Talk about a game decided until the end... Well, let's see how it ends...
This feels so weird, talking and playing while being exposed to everyone, it's also so exciting, just give me a second...
Greetings! My name is Ringo! And I know we are going to have a most wonderful game. Muahahaha!
Greetings! My name is Ringo! If we are going to play this game, we may as well introduce ourselves.
Hello everyone! My name is Ringo! And I'll be happy to play to~background.time~!
Oh yeah, in case you are wondering why I do those math expressions when someone else loses, it's kind of a quirk I got used to doing while casting spells during Puyo battles...
Oh, by the way, If you are wondering what is that jump thing I do when someone else loses, it's just a little thing I got used to doing when sending an attack to someone else during Puyo battles...
In case you are wondering, Puyos are these colored jelly circle thingies. We get 4 of the same color together to make them pop, and then use the energy that comes from the pop to cast spells!
I probably could've taken off my stockings, but then you'd just have seen my panties, and I think it helps me feel more dressed, if I'm honest.
I guess I could take my socks off... but if I did that, I dunno. I feel like it's less of what you want to see, but more than I want to show, I guess?

By the way, I'm kinda bad at remembering names of people I've just met, so if I call someone stuff like "weird hat girl" or something of the sort instead of your name, I don't mean anything bad from it.
If I use weird nicknames for anyone here, I mean no wrong. I'm just not the greatest at remembering names of people I've just met.
I really wish the magic abilities the puyo give me were a bit more... useful... I mean, electrical attacks are nice and all but...
Once we trade cards there's nothing to do, so I may as well not even look at my hand until we have to reveal it.
Anyone has some sunscreen? I mean, we are at the beach and this game could still take a bit long so... I'd be fine with either putting it on myself or letting someone else do it if they want...

Listen ~player~. I may be trying to throw my hands on purpose during this game to get away from those creatures... But you won't mind, right? Think of it this way, you'll get to see more of me faster this way...
Is it bad that I feel glad to lose a hand under these circumstances? I know they are not doing anything harmful but I just can't get over them...
I know you're not really talking or anything, ~player~. But just having you here is making me feel a bit more relaxed with the current circumstances...
I'm just about done with school. And yeah! Suzuran Town has a ton of different outfits, but they're all a lot like this!
Y... Yeah... I'd like that...
Well, I don't really know what "Paksis" means, but if you explain it to me, maybe we can both figure if that's correct.
A... apple? Well, if you promise to stop with the scares... maybe...
A... an apple? After you have been throwing ghosts my way the whole game?! No way!
Would you mind doing it again? Noir? I promise I won't touch again without your permission...
Would you mind doing it again? Adrien? I promise I won't touch again without your permission...
Not at all Adrien... Go ahead...
Y... yeah I won't mind it... And I promise I won't touch again without your permission...
With my panties too? That does sound exciting, so... yeah, go ahead, Adrien...
With my panties too? That does sound exciting, so... yeah, go ahead, Noir...
After everything that has happened during this game? Yeah... I'll gladly let you do it...
Well, the thing is, no one really knows exactly how Puyo energy affects dimensions, and after a while everyone just started rolling with it as if it's nothing...
Well, I guess that would be a nice way to break the ice between strangers, and I do have a couple extra apples, so yeah, you can have one!
Sorry to disappoint, but no relation. I do like to sing though, so I wonder if there would be a chance to group if I ever meet him. We could even make a band! Something kinda like "The Ringles"!

I wouldn't call it a sport, though it is fun. We just use magic to move 4 blobs of the same color next to each other, which causes them to pop, and we use the MP that comes out of that to throw spells at our opponent.
Oh! You know what Puyo Puyo is? Excellent! If you know how to play it then maybe we can have a match after this game is over and before I go back home.

Heh, I assume you are trying to cast a spell like I do? I'm afraid it won't do much unless you already have a bit of magic within you, and I don't think teasing ~player~ is enough to give you magic powers.
Professional? As in getting paid for it? Hah, I wish. Most of the puyo I do is either for fun or to save the day.

Well perhaps not on the strip your clothes off side of wild. But I've seen a lot of stuff on my adventures, yes. Let's just say that's why something like this game may be a bit of a good change of pace...
You do? Yeah, I guess that would make sense, you already do the whole funny poses while saying non-sense thing down to a tee, so I bet you must be great with magic. I´d love to learn from you!
This ol' thing here? It's just a boring calculus book... Or it was before the Puyo stuff started to happen, now it seems to be some sort of magic enhancer, I think.
Well I wouldn't mind if something like that did happen, but I'm a bit more focused on getting back home.
Not quite. I did have a crash course from one of my friends before she got possesed and started causing trouble. What is a "Vision" anyways?
To be honest I'm not used to being flirted with, Adrien. I must say though, it's a nice change of pace...

I'm going to take off my panties in front of a boy who was flirting with me, I mean don't get me wrong it's exciting but... I kinda expected it to be under a different type of circumstances... You know?
To be honest I'm not used to being flirted with, Noir. I must say though, it's a nice change of pace...

I'm going to take off my panties in front of a boy who was flirting with me, and I don't even know his real name... I mean don't get me wrong it's exciting but... I kinda expected it to be under a different type of circumstances... You know?
You think I would be a good addition to your idol group?! I'm flattered!
You think I would be a good addition to your idol group?! I'm flattered! But wait... Wouldn't I need to be a zombie too for that?! If so I have to decline...
I guess I was too surprised to change my cards. Yeah... I'm going to be fine, and I will be playing the game, I just never expected to find you here, Arle.
Not usually. But it's nice to be recognized for hard work. And I do a lot of hard work...
...Yeah, you're telling me. There's all sorts of weird teleportation and other worlds, and Puyos... And allegedly... ghosts.
You've never Puyo battled? If not I can maybe teach you how to do it, it's really fun! And it may also end up helping me get back home too!
It's not really a puzzle, is it?
I do know a thing or two about apples... what's up, chat?
I wish I could say yes, but my friend Maguro manages to come up with gifts three times better than mine! That kinda always makes me scream ‘HOW DARE HE OUTDO ME LIKE THAT!
...I guess this game's a good time to talk about it. But...
W-when you say it like...! I-it's not as though I do it every day!
Try me, or mess with my family or friends, and I'll hit you with my strongest spell, Streaming-chan!
I don't know if naturally gifted, brunette magician girl. But I did learn Puyo, along with it's related magic, really quickly, I guess Arle was just a really good teacher.
Well, the only magic I know is puyo battles and a bit of electricity based attacks, but that's about it to be honest, brunette magician girl...
With how many worlds my adventures have made me go to, and how pretty much all of them had some sort of magic, you're going to have to be waaay more specific, brunette magician girl.
Monster hunting? Heh, that sounds fun, sadly my actual world lacks any type of monsters to be hunted in the first place...
Oh, I'm not eating this apple. It was a gift from my grandmother and I just like to carry it with me because of that.
Well, I've had my share of space adventures so I'd rather stay with my feet at home, Jura. But I'd gladly teach your crew how to Puyo, you could even use it to power your ships!
Thanks, though no. My grandma is in another world, along with everyone else I know, which is why I need to win this game, hopefully that will get me back there.
You got it a bit wrong. I do like stuff that makes me think, but this apple was actually a gift from my grandma to me, Jessie.
Psychic, me? Nah, I just use know a little bit of attack magic, though I know a certain goth girl who'd probably be flattered if you told her that.
Ringo, but didn't I already say my name when we started the game?
Well, sadly Puyo magic really isn't that useful in an ordinary life, most of it being defensive or offensive magic. Which is why I get excited every time an adventure starts!
Well, my family runs a greengrocer store and... It just seems to be a thing to name your kids something related to work I guess... why'd your parents name you like they did?
Thanks, Heris. I guess you're about to see less of it, though.
Yeah, for some reason, Puyo battles aren't common knowledge here, but they aren't exactly rare or subtle things, Rita...
Nope! It's pretty old at this point. I'm pretty sure it's preserved due to weird puyo magic related things. So it's more like a toy than a food.

Great question, Mari! Puyo are round, slime-like creatures that, in most variations of the game, fall from the top of the screen in groups of two, three, and four. The pieces can be moved, dropped, and rotated as they fall. The piece falls until it reaches another Puyo or the bottom of the screen. When four or more Puyo of the same color line up adjacent to each other, the Puyo will connect to each other, "Pop", and disappear. Puyo of the same color can connect horizontally or vertically, but not diagonally.
Sure, why's that, Kumatora?
...Huh. I hadn't thought of that, but it has pretty much been everywhere with me... is there a way to check?
You really think so? I don't have much experience in poker so I wouldn't be able to make a proper comparison yet. Hold on, does that mean you are also a puyo player?
I believe you are a bit confused. Neither I nor my friends use a controller when doing tetris or puyo battles. Me and my friends let gravity and magic make the pieces or puyos go where we want.
Well, not to these type of games, but I certainly am good at learning new ones.
Apple magical Girl you say? Now that's a great coincidence, what's her thing? Electricity based magic like me?
Well, it's funny to see what you come up with but... I hope you are not expecting me to flirt back, I'm terrible at this you know...
Sadly Sakura. I don't think this game works like that...

Well, it's no secret really. Ever since I learnt how to play Puyo Puyo, I've been getting into many adventures. Some small, like taking care of a bird... Some big, like saving worlds from getting destroyed. All by playing Puyo. Would you like to play a round?

Sadly there are no academies on my world to teach me to control my power, so I can only ever practice it when my friends from other worlds show up. I would love to learn more on my own if I could though.
Not quite, twintailed purple eyes girl. The thing is, back in my world, almost everyone looks kinda small framed. The people around here seem to be on average bigger than people like us though...
Really now? This is the first time I hear someone say something like that to me. Thanks!
Something the matter over there? You seem a bit lost in thought, redhead idol girl.
Oh, have we met before? You say that like if you already knew me, What do you mean by "In the flesh or the pixel"?
I guess it has to do with my love of puzzles, I see any math problem, specially long ones and I see an unsolved puzzle, so I can't but try to find the answer to it!
Yep! My name means "apple". Why do you ask, "Lion"?

You know, I've tried to figure that myself too. All I know is that one day, puyos flooded my world, then Arle shows up, tells me I got exposed to "the light", leaves and the next thing I know I'm popping puyos with a tea-drinking skeleton!
When it comes to boys, I guess so.
Y... Yeah, that was part of it...
A senior... One about to be a bit less dressed...
You would be right, popping Puyos is kinda like a puzzle, which is why I like it so much!

Alright, how about we don't make hitting me with two losses in a row the standard?
Well, I guess the rule of three applies even for losing 2 rounds in a row...
Anyone can do a 2-chain... But boy do they hurt more when we are talking about strip poker and not Puyo...
Well, twice in a row is still recoverable. Even if my clothes aren't while we keep playing...
Getting hit with a 2-chain is nothing new... I just wish it was under different circumstances...
This is fine, after all, I did take a while before losing one time.
Well, twice in a row is still acceptable. You know, after taking so long to lose at all.
Getting hit with a 2-chain is nothing new. And I guess you can have it after I've made you all wait for so long in the first place.
This is fine, anyone can do a 2-chain...
Well, twice in a row is still recoverable.
Getting hit with a 2-chain is nothing new.
A 3 chain would scare new players, but I can still reflect this damage...
I am starting to get really nervous here...
Usually I prefer to see longer chains do damage to other players!
Well, twice in a row is still recoverable. Even at the cost of my shame...
Getting hit with a 2-chain is nothing new. I just wish it didn't happen in a game like this...
This is turning into a disaster...
Alright, seriously, can someone else please start losing hands now?
I am starting to not like this adventure anymore...
Alright, I'm calling it, rigged! You all rigged this game against me, there's just no way, five in a row?!
This is... I mean... I was fully clothed before this streak began... How?
Man, I don't even get the chance to put an act to go along with the costume and I already have to get rid of my staff?
If you want a two-chain of two so badly, I'll give you a pair alright...
Getting hit with a 2-chain would be nothing in Puyo... This isn't Puyo, however...
Well I guess delaying doesn't work when you just have two bad hands in a row...
It may be just a 2-chain, but it feels like I'm getting hit with a rock nuisance puyo...
Well done... I guess then it's time for me to reveal my big secret...
Well, I guess this is what I get for throwing during the early game...
I see we're starting with the wrong foot, huh? Well, here it goes...
Gotta admit, even I'm surprised I managed to come so far without losing a single hand...
I can feel everyone's confidence rubbing off on me already. Alright, here I go!
Everyone here is so confident, I can't help but get some confidence on myself too!
And I was just starting to think I could carry this streak until the end...
Hey, considering how much some of us are already showing, I think I can lose a round without worry.
Sorry. I guess I was too surprised to see you here, Arle. Don't worry, I'm going to be fine, and I will be playing the game.
W... well, while I did like the adrenaline rush a couple moments ago, I think I'll go with something less daring this time...
I may be winning, but it doesn't feel like it anymore. Luckily I still have one more trick up my sleeve.
My status as "leader" feels like a joke at this point... But there's still one more barrier for my pride.
Ah rats... was really hoping I could end this battle without having to get here...
Just let me win, please!
Being in front means I can take a couple risks. I don't mind if it fails from time to time.
Battles without at least a bit of back and forth feel a bit empty anyways...
Nice, we wouldn't like this to end so quickly, right?
One sided battles are boring anyways.
I may be in the lead, but I better stop playing risky or I'll regret it...
I need to be careful before I lose my lead.
You have to be careful when you are in front, sometimes you are just helping the opponents setup a comeback.
No perfect clear for me I see, oh well.
I knew a perfect game would be impossible.
A calculated risk.
Nothing to worry about, yet.
Probabilities dictated this would happen eventually.
Usually I like an even battle, but then again, we don't really play strip Puyo back at home...
I'm already exposing more than I'm used to... I need to improve my plays.

I can comeback from this, I'll just need to clear some nuisance Puyos... uh... I mean cards...

You guys watching me is part of the game, or am I really that enticing to you all?
Doing something like this already feels naughty, but to do it in the middle of a classroom too...
Doing something like this already feels naughty, but to do it outdoors, with the risk of anyone else just passing by and seeing too...
It's just a fantasy... so you can... w-what's that word? You can... creampie me, if you want...
Mmf... y-you... inside me, instead of these fingers...!
Leaving aside the embarrassment of doing this in front of others, this is great...
Once you get a rhythm going, it feels so good...
I just need to keep up like this for a bit longer and I'll...
*Louder than before moans of pure pleasure*
This feels way too good...
Oh yeah... I feel it coming...
♥ A bit more... A bit more! ♥
Keep talking people. I'm starting to like it...
You guys being so descriptive seems to be awakening something in me. So keep doing it!
This is crazy, I'm liking this way more than I expected...
I think I just found my spot...
10-chain, perfect clear!
That was perfect!
A plus!
Just... a little... more...
The way you talked to me during that and helped me there... You are amazing, Adrien...
Well, I don't know if you've noticed, but I've kinda been levitating almost every time someone else lost a round, Perona...
Don't be silly! I'm not going to eat this apple; It holds too much sentimental value... And also is like 2 years old...
Well, I went from beind deadly scared of ghosts to orgasming in front of them... Quite a turn of events, and I have you to thank for it, ~player~.
Strange. Just like when you lose a Puyo battle... Well, my mind's a lot clearer now. And more comfortable with this type of stuff... Now let's untie this...
That was great, now if you excuse me, I kinda want to take these hairbands off....
That was low-key AMAZING... Now please give me a second to make myself even more comfortable...
Listen, the game is fun and all... But I couldn't exactly put sunscreen on myself and we're kinda taking long here...
Now could we please hurry the game a bit? The situation maaay be a bit hot, but the temperature sure isn't...
Had I known I would be sitting in the sand I would have brought a towel...
I gotta admit, I enjoyed the game, shameful acts and all...
You know, once you stay naked for a bit, a bit of the shame starts to fade away...
I'll admit it, that was kinda, really, really relaxing...
Even with all things I've said, please never tell about this to anyone you meet that may know me, please...
If a word of what I did today manages to get back to any of my friends, I'll never be able to live it down...
I may make an attempt to uh... enjoy myself a bit more, once I get back home that is...
I hope at least I didn't look too awkward doing it, did I?
Hmmm, I wonder if any of my friends would... No, you dummy, take those crazy thoughts out of your head...
I sure hope this is a one-off adventure type deal, 'cause I sure won't be able to do this with any random enemy I encounter...
Well, that's one thing I can scratch out of things I never expected myself to do...
If you ever end up showing up at my world, please don't mention this to anyone and I'll give you some fruits from my family's business in exchange for your discretion...
I honestly doubt this game has any actual magical properties to it, but it sure felt like it did a couple moments ago...
At this point, nothing I say will produce a net positive impression, huh?
At any rate, at least I can say I did like the rush of doing something so... risky, for once...
Well, I guess I better start thinking on what else to do if this game doesn't help me get back home.
That sure was something else... ♥
Just like when you are out early on a multi-people puyo battle, staying here to see who wins is fun!
♪ *cheerful whistles of happiness and relaxation* ♪
I admit I was a bit nervous at first, but this has been a great experience!
I am sorry for that little hiccup at the beginning, but hey, I guess not all ghosts are terrible after all...
There's only one explanation for me winning today, you ghosts threw the game just to see me be scared for longer, I have no more doubt that you all are evil now!
This doesn't feel like a victory at this point... Now if you excuse me, I'm going to find a private room and spend a little bit of time alone...
That was perfect! But I'm still stuck in this world...
Winner every time! Hmmm.. but it seems I'm still here...
I enjoy a victory as much as everyone else, but it seems this game wasn't enough to get me back home, any other ideas, anyone?
I guess that'll do. Strange... I'm not back at home.
Still on this world after winning huh? I guess I'll need to investigate more...
I got to keep my dignity and win the game. And while I'm not back home yet I'm sure I'll think of something. So thanks for this fun experience!
Well, that was an experience, but it seems it didn't work, wanna try to battle Puyo instead next time?
That was certainly something, but I think I'll stick to games I know next time...
Thanks for the game everyone, but it didn't help, I'll have to think of something else once I dress back up...
Not going to lie, I was kinda starting to hope to lose there. I feel that even more now that I've seen everyone else "relief" themselves... Can I still do it or do we need to play again?
Fine... I could join in that photo... Can't be worse than anything else you took during this game, right?
Well, since the game didn't work I may need to take your world and try what you suggested earlier, Noire. Though I hope you don't mind me staying in this world for just a little bit longer.
A clock creature appeared out of nowhere. What is going on? Is this part of the game? I'm so confused?!
W... well, I may not be back home, but I still had a lot of fun being a bit more daring than usual, so thanks for that everyone.
Well, I may have lost, but at least I'm going away with a unique experience today, thanks for the game to both of you, Adrien, and ~human~.
Well, I may have lost, but at least I'm going away with a unique experience today, thanks for the game, Adrien, ~human~, and the rest too!
Well, that was fun. So, wanna try another round while we wait for Ecolo come pick us up tomorrow, Arle?
Well, that's game one, anyone else wanna try again? How about you Arle, we still have a day to spend around here after all!
That may not have gone as I expected, but now that I know Arle is here with a plan to go back home, I feel more relaxed. I may even want a rematch! What do you say, ~name~?
Well that was match one. But usually puyo battles don't settle until someone wins at least twice, let's go again!
You got me this time, ~winner~. But I'll be ready for a rematch, happy halloween!
I am sorry for that little hiccup at the beginning, but hey, I guess not all ghosts are terrible after all...
Huh... back to square one... I at least had fun though...
It was fun, but I'll probably need to try something else to go back home...
Well, that's game one, but back home problems never get solved by just one game, let's try again!
That may not have gone as I expected, but maybe a rematch will help me get closer to return, what do you say, ~name~?
Well, this game didn't bring me back home, but I didn't mind "losing" either. That said, any ideas on anything that may help me?
Well that was match one. But usually puyo battles don't settle until someone wins at least twice, let's go again!

state.text: Not gonna lie. I get the chills every time you stare at someone like that, pale black-haired lady.

case.state: Oh boy... I'm never going to be able to see Arle the same after this, huh...
Well... You could say this is a side of Arle I'm never going to forget seeing now...
Wait... Those names... You wouldn't mean the ones on that group that fell into my world once with the giant purple robot, right?
I guess he got bored of waiting wherever you left him. The little fellow has always been one to get bored easily, isn't he?
You really like to call ~player~ a virgin, don't you? So much insistence on the subject is making me think that maybe you are the virgin instead!
This can appear at any point in the game if its priority is higher or equal to the highest of the more specific case.
Each time binah does the sadistic pose this counter will go up by 1
This sets ringo's AI to bad as she gets distracted by someone during their forfeit
This resets ringo's AI to average after someone finishes their forfeit

epilogue.description: After the game ends you and Ringo decide to hang out until it's time for her to return to her world, but there will be one more unexpected bump on the road that will get you two to get closer than expected.
epilogue.title: Getting back home

scene.name: The day after
scene.directive: It was really nice of you to hang around with me.
Having someone show me this place to pass the night and keeping company made this time fly by.
I hope we end up meeting again sometime, ~player~.
Riiiiingoooo~~
Gah!
Oh, it's you.
Hey Ecolo, I’m glad you are able to bring me back home...
...even if I can somehow not believe you’re not planning to cause any trouble today.
Trouble?
You misunderstand me, Ringo.
It was never my intention to cause you trouble when I sent you here~~.
You were the one that sent me here?!
Of course!
Who else you know would be able to send you to such a fun place on its own?
Because you did have fun, right?
Well… yeah, I did but…
Yes…?
You still shouldn’t just send people across dimensions without permission!
Alright, alright...
I promise I’ll at least let you know when I’m going to move you around next time.
That’s not what I meant!
We’re going now!

scene.name: The opposite side of Suzuran
scene.directive: Ecolo!
What? I told you before teleporting you, didn’t I?
That’s still not what I meant!…
I didn't even have time to say goodbye to...
Wait, why is ~player~ here…
And why is he naked?
Whoopsie!
Seems like I teleported your friend over here instead of both of you guys' clothes.
W... wait... What do you mean both of you guys'...
GAAAAHH!!
But you are here in Suzuran and that’s what you cared for, right?
We’re all the way across town!
Get us to my house, Ecolo!
But you get angry every time I move you around.
Plus, I heard that thing about you two having so much fun together.
Wouldn’t it be better to have one more adventure before parting ways?
Ecolo, you…
Now make it back to your house and I’ll try to get your friend back home
I’ll be waiting for you Ringoooo…
Ecolooooo!
Ugh... Sorry you got dragged into this, ~player~,
He tends to do annoying stuff but he had never done something like this…
I know one thing though, he will not be coming back.
So we need to get to him.
... At least it seems to be midnight, and we both seem to have kept our footwear...
So with any luck we should be able to sneak through town without being noticed…
Besides, our current state is nothing we didn't face during the game so... let's do this! Follow me.

scene.name: An epilogue about being naked in the woods
scene.directive: I used to come to this park when I was smaller.
It's not too busy during the night so we should be able to hide, as long as we pay attention.
Plus it ends really close to the shopping district, which is where my house is.
So all things considered, this shouldn't be too hard.
Though, I have to say.
I never expected to find myself strolling through it buck naked...
Even less in company of someone else.
It's weird, isn't it?
Despite it all...
I don't mind you seeing me like this...
It's actually making me feel kind of nice... to be honest.
...hehe
We're getting close to the end of the park...
We'll need to cross Suzuran's main street…
It’s very illuminated too…
Maybe we should look for a different route and…
CAREFUL, GET DOWN!

scene.name: Leaving the park
scene.directive: Sorry for pushing you like that.
But I think I saw someone else on the park.
Who would be out here at this hour of...
Oh! Is that you over there in the dark, Ringo?
Hey! Ringo!
Oh no!
That’s one of my friends…
And he’s coming right towards us…
Quick! Let’s cross the street to get away from him.
The light is about to change! We need to do it, now!
Quick! To that alley!

scene.name: Alley intro
scene.directive: Phew…
That was really close…
And exciting...?
I blocked the way with some stuff after we entered...
So why don’t we take a small break?
This may sound weird but…
Running away like this while almost getting caught…
Was it exciting for you too, ~player~?
Well, looking down there I don't think I even needed to ask...
Say…
This alley is pretty hidden and honestly…
Well...
How do I say this...
You're really cute and I uh...
Considering our current states of undress...
And the fact that my body still feels burning hot...
Would you like to uh...
Oh boy... I can't bring myself to say it...
Take...
me...
here?

scene.name: kiss
scene.directive: Hmm...
I'm glad we agree...

scene.name: Hands on approach
scene.directive: You know, I didn't get to see you do this when we were playing...
But honestly, doing this myself is much more exciting...
And I think you're enjoying it more as well.
Don't say anything...
Just answer with your buddy down here if you agree...
W... Wow...
I guess you really really liked it...
But now that we're both warmed up...
I want us to go all the way...

scene.name: Tease
scene.directive: Before we start...
Just, please be careful...
You'll be my first, after all...

scene.name: Initial penetration
scene.directive: Ahhh!
Jeez, didn't I just tell you to be careful?
It's fine, you can start moving now.

scene.name: Fuk
scene.directive: Oh, ~player~, you're really good at this.
I don't even care if someone sees us anymore! I just want to go on and on...
~player~! ~player~! Ahhh!!!
*Rumble* *Rumble*
Oh, someone is moving the stuff I placed at the alley entrance.
There's another way out of the alley.
But I wouldn't blame you if you just wanted to stay here until we got caught...
Heh, no you are right, we still have to reach my home to get you back to your world.
Let's go, we're not too far now.

scene.name: Arriving finally
scene.directive: Well, we made it.
My family is out on vacation so we should be good to enter.
But before we do.
I'd like to thank you.
This night...
Well... it will be one I will remember forever
And I hope you do so too, because...
Awww, aren't you two lovebirds cute?
Ecolo...
WHY DO YOU ALWAYS HAVE TO BE SO NOSY?!
Hey! Who's screaming so early in the morning, is that you Ringo?
Oh no! I was too loud! Quick, let's get inside!

scene.name: Home sweet home
scene.directive: Phew, good thing I know where the extra door key is.
Sooo... How was your adventure?
You!...
Ugh... Fine...
I'll admit. It was honestly pretty good.
He he!
I knew it!
I could see it in both of your eyes while you were getting busy in that alley.
You- were watching us?!
Of course I was watching you.
From the start till the end.
Good thing I did, that way I was able to "divert" a couple possible unwanted witnesses.
Did you really think I'd let you all alone like that?
Even I'm not that evil.
I... But you...
YOU ARE SO IRRITATING!
Anyways, with this little extra trip done
I think it's time for your pal to leave
Wait, leave?
Don't worry, Ringo. I won't pull any more tricks on the guy.
After all, I like him more than both that weirdo you have for a neighbor and the space guy.
Of course, I would have offered myself to give you tonight's type of fun, Ringo, but... non-corporeal body and all...
Ecolo, what are you even talking about? But more importantly, don't just take ~player~ away like this!
I hope you said goodbyes in time, 'cause off we go!
No, Ecolo, wait!
ECOLO!!!

scene.name: Back to the inventory
scene.directive: Here we go
Back to your dump.
Huh?
What's that?
This isn't your home?
And you don't have any clothes here?
Eh...
You'll figure it out.
But, say, ignore this last little hiccup...
And I'll tell Ringo I can bring her back here whenever she wants!
Then you two can have even more fun together for me.
There's a good chance she'll want to see you again in a couple of weeks regardless.
You know, since you both went raw and all...
So see you later! Creature-Thing-That-May-Also-Be-A-Father-Soon!
